timeline.bodyText:
Plexus deserialization is not configurable for enums (this is the reason why this values were still in lower-case).
Make sure that this value is never deserialized from a Maven property (i.e. jkube.mode), if it still is deserialized somewhere, it will fail).

replies.bodyText:
Ok, let me rephrase. These properties are dead in the Mojo, they are directly computed/retrieved in the Enricher, meaning these fields can be deleted (fields are ignored, same as provided defaults).
So what we need is an issue providing details about what these properties do (link to docs is good), and what should we do with them. Basically, we need an answer to why are they in the Mojo if they are ignored > this seems like the result of an abandoned work in progress. And what we want, complete their movement to the Mojo (properties no longer retrieved from Enricher) or complete their movement to the Enricher (delete them from the Mojo).
